attributes.action: Demand Gordon Brown get a public explanation from John Prescott as to how he spent tax payers money on 2 toilet seats in such a short space of time!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British public would like to know how John Prescott sits down on his toilet.  Claiming for 2 toilet seats in such a short time must mean he has got his technique all wrong.  I would like Gordon to address this with John and get some kind of public apology or a demonstartion as to where he is going wrong.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
